trans-unit.source: .eslintignore patterns are now resolved from the location of the file
trans-unit.target: 现在可以从文件位置解析.eslintignore模式

trans-unit.source: 1tbs
trans-unit.target: 1tbs

trans-unit.source: comma-dangle used to be recommended because Internet Explorer 8 and earlier threw a syntax error when it found a dangling comma on object literal properties. However, Internet Explorer 8 was end-of-lifed in January 2016 and all other active browsers allow dangling commas. As such, we consider dangling commas to now be a stylistic issue instead of a possible error.
trans-unit.target: comma-dangle 以前建议使用逗号分隔，因为Internet Explorer 8和更早版本在对象文字属性上发现一个悬空的逗号时引发语法错误。但是， Internet Explorer 8于 2016年1月寿终正寝，所有其他活动的浏览器都允许悬挂逗号。因此，我们认为悬挂逗号现在是一个样式问题，而不是可能的错误。

trans-unit.source: complexity used to have a hardcoded default of 11 in eslint:recommended that would be used if you turned the rule on without specifying a maximum. The default is now 20. The rule actually always had a default of 20, but eslint:recommended was overriding it by mistake.
trans-unit.target: complexity eslint:recommended 中以前使用的硬编码默认值为11，如果未指定最大值则打开规则将使用的复杂度。现在的默认值为20。该规则实际上始终默认为20，但是 eslint:recommended 误将其覆盖。

trans-unit.source: for-direction enforces that a for loop update clause moves the counter in the right direction.
trans-unit.target: for-direction 强制 for 循环更新子句向正确的方向移动计数器。

trans-unit.source: generator-star is replaced by generator-star-spacing
trans-unit.target: generator-star替换为generator-star-spacing

trans-unit.source: getter-return enforces that a return statement is present in property getters.
trans-unit.target: getter-return 强制在属性getter中存在 return 语句。

trans-unit.source: global-strict is replaced by strict
trans-unit.target: global-strict替换为strict

trans-unit.source: no-arrow-condition is replaced by a combination of no-confusing-arrow and no-constant-condition. Turn on both of these rules to get the same functionality as no-arrow-condition.
trans-unit.target: 没有箭头条件是由一个组合来取代无混淆箭头和无定条件。启用这两个规则以获得与 no-arrow-condition 相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: no-async-promise-executor disallows using an async function as the argument to the Promise constructor, which is usually a bug.
trans-unit.target: no-async-promise-executor 不允许将 async 函数用作 Promise 构造函数的参数，这通常是一个错误。

trans-unit.source: no-comma-dangle is replaced by comma-dangle
trans-unit.target: no-comma-dangle替换为comma-dangle

trans-unit.source: no-compare-neg-zero disallows comparisons to -0
trans-unit.target: no-compare-neg-zero 不允许与 -0 进行比较

trans-unit.source: no-console disallows calling functions like console.log. While this rule is useful in many cases (e.g. to avoid inadvertently leaving debugging statements in production code), it is not as broadly applicable as the other rules in eslint:recommended, and it was a source of false positives in cases where console.log is acceptable (e.g. in CLI applications).
trans-unit.target: no-console 不允许调用 console.log 之类的函数。尽管此规则在许多情况下很有用（例如，避免无意中将调试语句保留在生产代码中），但它没有像 eslint:recommended 中的其他规则那样广泛地适用，并且在 console.log 情况下它是误报的来源是可以接受的（例如在CLI应用程序中）。

trans-unit.source: no-empty-class is replaced by no-empty-character-class
trans-unit.target: 无空类替换为无空字符类

trans-unit.source: no-empty-label is replaced by no-labels with {"allowLoop": true, "allowSwitch": true} option.
trans-unit.target: 使用 {"allowLoop": true, "allowSwitch": true} 选项将no-empty-label替换为no-labels。

trans-unit.source: no-extra-strict is replaced by strict
trans-unit.target: 无严格限制由严格取代

trans-unit.source: no-misleading-character-class reports character classes in regular expressions that might not behave as expected.
trans-unit.target: no-misleading-character-class 字符类会以正则表达式报告字符类，这些字符类的行为可能不符合预期。

trans-unit.source: no-native-reassign was previously part of no-undef, but was split out because it didn't make sense as part of another rule. The no-native-reassign rule warns whenever you try to overwrite a read-only global variable.
trans-unit.target: no-native-reassign 以前是 no-undef 的一部分，但由于没有意义作为另一条规则的一部分而被拆分。每当您尝试覆盖只读全局变量时， no-native-reassign 规则都会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: no-prototype-builtins reports method calls like foo.hasOwnProperty("bar") (which are a frequent source of bugs), and suggests that they be replaced with Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(foo, "bar") instead.
trans-unit.target: no-prototype-builtins foo.hasOwnProperty("bar") 报告诸如 foo.hasOwnProperty（“ bar”）（这是漏洞的常见来源）之类的方法调用，并建议将其替换为 Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(foo, "bar") 。

trans-unit.source: no-reserved-keys is replaced by quote-props
trans-unit.target: no-reserved-keys替换为quote-props

trans-unit.source: no-shadow-restricted-names disallows shadowing variables like undefined (e.g. with code like let undefined = 5;), since is likely to confuse readers.
trans-unit.target: no-shadow-restricted-names 不允许像 undefined 这样的阴影变量（例如，使用 let undefined = 5; 这样的代码），因为这可能会使读者感到困惑。

trans-unit.source: no-space-before-semi is replaced by semi-spacing
trans-unit.target: 半间隔之前没有空间被半间隔代替

trans-unit.source: no-unsafe-finally helps catch finally clauses that may not behave as you think.
trans-unit.target: no-unsafe-finally 帮助捕获 finally 因为你认为可能无法正常使用的条款。

trans-unit.source: no-useless-catch reports catch clauses that are redundant and can be removed from the code without changing its behavior.
trans-unit.target: no-useless-catch 报告 catch 了多余的子句，这些子句可以从代码中删除而不更改其行为。

trans-unit.source: no-useless-escape disallows uselessly-escaped characters in strings and regular expressions
trans-unit.target: no-useless-escape 禁止字符串和正则表达式中的无用转义字符

trans-unit.source: no-with disallows use of the with statement, which can make code difficult to understand and cause compatibility problems.
trans-unit.target: no-with 禁止使用 with 语句，这会使代码难以理解并引起兼容性问题。

trans-unit.source: no-wrap-func is replaced by no-extra-parens
trans-unit.target: no-wrap-func替换为no-extra-parens

trans-unit.source: require-atomic-updates reports race condition bugs that can occur when reassigning variables in async functions.
trans-unit.target: require-atomic-updates 报告在重新分配异步函数中的变量时可能发生的竞争条件错误。

trans-unit.source: require-yield helps to identify generator functions that do not have the yield keyword.
trans-unit.target: require-yield 帮助识别没有 yield 关键字的生成器函数。

trans-unit.target: 函数后的空间名称被替换为函数前的空间

trans-unit.source: space-after-keywords is replaced by keyword-spacing.
trans-unit.target: 关键字关键字间隔替换关键字关键字后的空格。

trans-unit.source: space-before-function-parentheses is replaced by space-before-function-paren
trans-unit.target: 空间的前-功能-括号被替换空间之前函数-括号

trans-unit.source: space-before-keywords is replaced by keyword-spacing.
trans-unit.target: 空间之前的关键字被替换的关键字间距。

trans-unit.target: 括号中的空间由对象弯曲间距和数组括号间距取代

trans-unit.source: space-return-throw-case is replaced by keyword-spacing.
trans-unit.target: space-return-throw-case替换为keyword-spacing。

trans-unit.target: space-unary-word-ops替换为space-unary-ops

trans-unit.source: spaced-line-comment is replaced by spaced-comment
trans-unit.target: 空格注释替换为空格注释

trans-unit.source: Polyjuice is a utility for converting JSCS (and JSHint) configuration files into ESLint configuration files automatically. It understands the equivalent rules from each utility and will automatically output an ESLint configuration file that is a good approximation of your existing JSCS file.
trans-unit.target: Polyjuice是一个实用程序，可将JSCS（和JSHint）配置文件自动转换为ESLint配置文件。它了解每个实用程序的等效规则，并会自动输出与现有JSCS文件近似的ESLint配置文件。

trans-unit.source: v4.1.0+. Sometimes a more fine-controlled configuration is necessary, for example if the configuration for files within the same directory has to be different. Therefore you can provide configurations under the overrides key that will only apply to files that match specific glob patterns, using the same format you would pass on the command line (e.g., app/**/*.test.js).
trans-unit.target: v4.1.0 +。有时，例如，如果同一目录中文件的配置必须不同，则需要进行更精细控制的配置。因此，您可以使用 overrides 项下的配置（仅适用于匹配特定glob模式的文件）提供配置，并使用与在命令行上传递的格式相同的格式（例如， app/**/*.test.js ）。

trans-unit.source: "*" is wildcard. This matches any statements.
trans-unit.target: "*" 是通配符。这匹配任何语句。

trans-unit.source: "1tbs" (default) enforces one true brace style
trans-unit.target: "1tbs" （默认）强制采用一种真正的支撑样式

trans-unit.source: "ArrayExpression": true ignores comma style in array literals
trans-unit.target: "ArrayExpression": true 忽略数组文字中的逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "ArrayExpression" (default: 1) enforces indentation level for elements in arrays. It can also be set to the string "first", indicating that all the elements in the array should be aligned with the first element.
trans-unit.target: "ArrayExpression" （默认值：1）对数组中的元素强制执行缩进级别。也可以将其设置为字符串 "first" ，指示数组中的所有元素都应与第一个元素对齐。

trans-unit.source: "ArrayExpression" (default: 1) enforces indentation level for elements in arrays. It can also be set to the string "first", indicating that all the elements in the array should be aligned with the first element. This can also be set to "off" to disable checking for array elements.
trans-unit.target: "ArrayExpression" （默认值：1）对数组中的元素强制执行缩进级别。也可以将其设置为字符串 "first" ，指示数组中的所有元素都应与第一个元素对齐。也可以将其设置为 "off" 以禁用检查数组元素。

trans-unit.source: "ArrayPattern": true ignores comma style in array patterns of destructuring
trans-unit.target: "ArrayPattern": true 在销毁数组模式中忽略逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "ArrowFunctionExpression": true ignores comma style in the parameters of arrow function expressions
trans-unit.target: "ArrowFunctionExpression": true 忽略箭头函数表达式的参数中的逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "CallExpression": true ignores comma style in the arguments of function calls
trans-unit.target: "CallExpression": true 忽略函数调用参数中的逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "CallExpression" takes an object to define rules for function call expressions.
trans-unit.target: "CallExpression" 一个对象来定义函数调用表达式的规则。

trans-unit.source: "ExportDeclaration" configuration for named exports
trans-unit.target: "ExportDeclaration" 命名导出的“ ExportDeclaration”配置

trans-unit.source: "FunctionDeclaration": true ignores comma style in the parameters of function declarations
trans-unit.target: "FunctionDeclaration": true 忽略函数声明参数中的逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "FunctionDeclaration" takes an object to define rules for function declarations.
trans-unit.target: "FunctionDeclaration" 一个对象来定义函数声明的规则。

trans-unit.source: "FunctionExpression": true ignores comma style in the parameters of function expressions
trans-unit.target: "FunctionExpression": true 忽略函数表达式参数中的逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "FunctionExpression" takes an object to define rules for function expressions.
trans-unit.target: "FunctionExpression" 一个对象来定义函数表达式的规则。

trans-unit.source: "IIFEs" (default false) include any code included in IIFEs.
trans-unit.target: "IIFEs" （默认为 false ）包括IIFE中包含的任何代码。

trans-unit.source: "ImportDeclaration": true ignores comma style in the specifiers of import declarations
trans-unit.target: "ImportDeclaration": true 忽略导入声明说明符中的逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "ImportDeclaration" (default: 1) enforces indentation level for import statements. It can be set to the string "first", indicating that all imported members from a module should be aligned with the first member in the list. This can also be set to "off" to disable checking for imported module members.
trans-unit.target: "ImportDeclaration" （默认值：1）对导入语句强制执行缩进级别。可以将其设置为字符串 "first" ，指示从模块导入的所有成员都应与列表中的第一个成员对齐。也可以将其设置为 "off" 以禁用检查导入的模块成员。

trans-unit.source: "ImportDeclaration" configuration for named imports
trans-unit.target: "ImportDeclaration" 命名导入的“ ImportDeclaration”配置

trans-unit.source: "MemberExpression" (default: 1) enforces indentation level for multi-line property chains. This can also be set to "off" to disable checking for MemberExpression indentation.
trans-unit.target: "MemberExpression" （默认值：1）对多行属性链强制执行缩进级别。也可以将其设置为 "off" 以禁用对MemberExpression缩进的检查。

trans-unit.source: "MemberExpression" (off by default) enforces indentation level for multi-line property chains (except in variable declarations and assignments)
trans-unit.target: "MemberExpression" （默认情况下为关闭）对多行属性链强制执行缩进级别（变量声明和赋值中除外）

trans-unit.source: "NewExpression": true ignores comma style in the parameters of constructor expressions
trans-unit.target: "NewExpression": true 忽略构造函数表达式的参数中的逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "ObjectExpression": true ignores comma style in object literals
trans-unit.target: "ObjectExpression": true 忽略对象文字中的逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "ObjectExpression" (default: 1) enforces indentation level for properties in objects. It can be set to the string "first", indicating that all properties in the object should be aligned with the first property.
trans-unit.target: "ObjectExpression" （默认值：1）对对象中的属性强制执行缩进级别。可以将其设置为字符串 "first" ，指示对象中的所有属性都应与first属性对齐。

trans-unit.source: "ObjectExpression" (default: 1) enforces indentation level for properties in objects. It can be set to the string "first", indicating that all properties in the object should be aligned with the first property. This can also be set to "off" to disable checking for object properties.
trans-unit.target: "ObjectExpression" （默认值：1）对对象中的属性强制执行缩进级别。可以将其设置为字符串 "first" ，指示对象中的所有属性都应与first属性对齐。也可以将其设置为 "off" 以禁用对对象属性的检查。

trans-unit.source: "ObjectExpression" configuration for object literals
trans-unit.target: "ObjectExpression" 对象文字的“ ObjectExpression”配置

trans-unit.source: "ObjectPattern": true ignores comma style in object patterns of destructuring
trans-unit.target: "ObjectPattern": true 在销毁对象模式中忽略逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "ObjectPattern" configuration for object patterns of destructuring assignments
trans-unit.target: "ObjectPattern" 用于销毁分配的对象模式的“ ObjectPattern”配置

trans-unit.source: "SwitchCase" (default: 0) enforces indentation level for case clauses in switch statements
trans-unit.target: "SwitchCase" （默认值：0）对 switch 语句中的 case 子句强制执行缩进级别

trans-unit.source: "VariableDeclaration": true ignores comma style in variable declarations
trans-unit.target: "VariableDeclaration": true 忽略变量声明中的逗号样式

trans-unit.source: "VariableDeclarator" (default: 1) enforces indentation level for var declarators; can also take an object to define separate rules for var, let and const declarations.
trans-unit.target: "VariableDeclarator" （默认值：1）对 var 声明符强制执行缩进级别；也可以使用一个对象为 var ， let 和 const 声明定义单独的规则。

trans-unit.source: "VariableDeclarator" (default: 1) enforces indentation level for var declarators; can also take an object to define separate rules for var, let and const declarations. It can also be "first", indicating all the declarators should be aligned with the first declarator.
trans-unit.target: "VariableDeclarator" （默认值：1）对 var 声明符强制执行缩进级别；也可以使用一个对象为 var ， let 和 const 声明定义单独的规则。也可以是 "first" ，指示所有声明符应与第一个声明符对齐。

trans-unit.source: "after": false disallows spaces after colons.
trans-unit.target: "after": false 不允许在冒号后加空格。

trans-unit.source: "after": false disallows spaces after commas
trans-unit.target: "after": false 不允许在逗号后加空格

trans-unit.source: "after": false disallows spaces after keywords
trans-unit.target: "after": false 不允许在关键字后添加空格

trans-unit.source: "after": true (Default) requires one or more spaces after colons.
trans-unit.target: "after": true （默认）在冒号后需要一个或多个空格。

trans-unit.source: "after": true (default) requires at least one space after keywords
trans-unit.target: "after": true （默认），关键字之后至少需要一个空格

trans-unit.source: "after": true (default) requires one or more spaces after commas
trans-unit.target: "after": true （默认）在逗号后需要一个或多个空格

trans-unit.source: "after" requires linebreaks to be placed after the operator
trans-unit.target: "after" 要求将换行符放置在运算符之后

trans-unit.source: "afterBlockComment": true requires an empty line after block comments
trans-unit.target: "afterBlockComment": true 要求在块注释后留空行

trans-unit.source: "afterLineComment": true requires an empty line after line comments
trans-unit.target: "afterLineComment": true 要求在行注释后留空行

trans-unit.source: "align" with an object value allows for fine-grained spacing when values are being aligned in object literals.
trans-unit.target: "align" 在对象文字中对齐值时，与对象值“对齐”可实现细粒度的间隔。

trans-unit.source: "all" (default) disallows unnecessary parentheses around any expression
trans-unit.target: "all" （默认）不允许在任何表达式周围使用不必要的括号

trans-unit.source: "all" - If all variables in destructuring should be const, this rule warns the variables. Otherwise, ignores them.
trans-unit.target: "all" -如果解构中的所有变量都应为 const ，则此规则会警告变量。否则，请忽略它们。

trans-unit.source: "allman" enforces Allman style
trans-unit.target: "allman" 强制采用Allman风格

trans-unit.source: "allow" (empty by default) - Each entry in this array can be one of ~, !!, + or * that are to be allowed.
trans-unit.target: "allow" （默认为 empty ）-此数组中的每个条目都可以是 ~ ， !! 之一。， + 或 * 。

trans-unit.source: "allow" allows specified identifiers to have dangling underscores
trans-unit.target: "allow" 允许指定的标识符带有下划线

trans-unit.source: "allow" has an array of strings which are allowed methods of the console object
trans-unit.target: "allow" 具有一个字符串数组，这些字符串是 console 对象的允许方法

trans-unit.source: "allow": Allows a list of bitwise operators to be used as exceptions.
trans-unit.target: "allow" ：允许将按位运算符的列表用作例外。

trans-unit.source: "allowAfterSuper": false (default) disallows dangling underscores in members of the super object
trans-unit.target: "allowAfterSuper": false （默认），禁止在 super 对象的成员中悬挂下划线

trans-unit.source: "allowAfterThis": false (default) disallows dangling underscores in members of the this object
trans-unit.target: "allowAfterThis": false （默认），禁止在 this 对象的成员中悬挂下划线

trans-unit.source: "allowAfterThisConstructor": false (default) disallows dangling underscores in members of the this.constructor object
trans-unit.target: "allowAfterThisConstructor": false （默认），禁止在 this.constructor 对象的成员中悬挂下划线。

trans-unit.source: "allowArrayEnd": true allows comments to appear at the end of array literals
trans-unit.target: "allowArrayEnd": true 允许注释出现在数组文字的末尾

trans-unit.source: "allowArrayStart": true allows comments to appear at the start of array literals
trans-unit.target: "allowArrayStart": true 允许注释出现在数组文字的开头

trans-unit.source: "allowArrowFunctions": true (default false) allows the use of arrow functions (honoured only when using declaration)
trans-unit.target: "allowArrowFunctions": true （默认为 false ）允许使用箭头函数（仅在使用 declaration 时尊重）

trans-unit.source: "allowBlockEnd": true allows comments to appear at the end of block statements
trans-unit.target: "allowBlockEnd": true 允许注释出现在块语句的末尾

trans-unit.source: "allowBlockStart": true allows comments to appear at the start of block statements
trans-unit.target: "allowBlockStart": true 允许注释出现在块语句的开头

trans-unit.source: "allowClassEnd": true allows comments to appear at the end of classes
trans-unit.target: "allowClassEnd": true 允许注释出现在课程末尾

trans-unit.source: "allowClassStart": true allows comments to appear at the start of classes
trans-unit.target: "allowClassStart": true 允许注释出现在课程开始时

trans-unit.source: "allowConstructorFlags" is an array of flags
trans-unit.target: "allowConstructorFlags" 是一组标志

trans-unit.source: "allowEmptyCatch": true allows empty catch clauses (that is, which do not contain a comment)
trans-unit.target: "allowEmptyCatch": true 允许空的 catch 子句（即不包含注释）

trans-unit.source: "allowForLoopAfterthoughts": true allows unary operators ++ and -- in the afterthought (final expression) of a for loop.
trans-unit.target: "allowForLoopAfterthoughts": true 允许一元运算符 ++ 和 -- 在 for 循环的事后（最终表达式）中。

trans-unit.source: "allowImplicit": false (default) When set to true, allows implicitly returning undefined with a return statement containing no expression.
trans-unit.target: "allowImplicit": false （默认）设置为true时，允许使用不包含表达式的 return 语句隐式返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: "allowImplicit": false (default) disallows implicitly returning undefined with a return statement.
trans-unit.target: "allowImplicit": false （默认）不允许使用 return 语句隐式返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: "allowLoop" (boolean, default is false) - If this option was set true, this rule ignores labels which are sticking to loop statements.
trans-unit.target: "allowLoop" （ boolean ，默认为 false ）-如果此选项设置为 true ，则此规则将忽略粘贴到循环语句的标签。

trans-unit.source: "allowObjectEnd": true allows comments to appear at the end of object literals
trans-unit.target: "allowObjectEnd": true 允许注释出现在对象文字的末尾

trans-unit.source: "allowObjectStart": true allows comments to appear at the start of object literals
trans-unit.target: "allowObjectStart": true 允许注释出现在对象文字的开头

trans-unit.source: "allowSingleLine": true (default false) allows the opening and closing braces for a block to be on the same line
trans-unit.target: "allowSingleLine": true （默认为 false ）允许块的开括号和闭括号在同一行

trans-unit.source: "allowSingleLineBlocks": true allows single-line blocks
trans-unit.target: "allowSingleLineBlocks": true 允许单行块

trans-unit.source: "allowSwitch" (boolean, default is false) - If this option was set true, this rule ignores labels which are sticking to switch statements.
trans-unit.target: "allowSwitch" （ boolean ，默认为 false ）-如果此选项设置为 true ，则此规则将忽略粘贴在switch语句上的标签。

trans-unit.source: "allowTemplateLiterals": true allows strings to use backticks
trans-unit.target: "allowTemplateLiterals": true 允许字符串使用反引号

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) enforces blank newlines around directives.
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）在指令周围强制使用空白换行符。

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) enforces newlines between the operands of a ternary expression.
trans-unit.target: "always" （始终）（默认）在三元表达式的操作数之间强制换行。

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) enforces that files end with a newline (LF)
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）强制文件以换行符（LF）结尾

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) expects that the shorthand will be used whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）期望尽可能使用速记。

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires an empty line after var, let, or const
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）在 var ， let 或 const 之后需要一个空行

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires assignment operator shorthand where possible
trans-unit.target: "always" （始终）（默认）在可能的情况下要求赋值运算符速记

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires empty lines at the beginning and ending of block statements and classes
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）在块语句和类的开头和结尾处需要空行

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires function expressions to have a name
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）要求函数表达式具有名称

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires line breaks between arguments
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）要求参数之间的换行符

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires line breaks between array elements
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）要求数组元素之间的换行符

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires one or more spaces
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）需要一个或多个空格

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires one variable declaration per scope
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）要求每个作用域声明一个变量

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires parens around arguments in all cases.
trans-unit.target: "always" 在所有情况下，“ always”（始终）（默认）都需要在参数周围加括号。

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires quotes around all object literal property names
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）要求在所有对象文字属性名称周围加上引号

trans-unit.source: "always" (default) requires semicolons at the end of statements
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）在语句末尾需要分号

trans-unit.source: "always" - Requires one or more spaces between a tag function and its template literal.
trans-unit.target: "always" -在标记函数及其模板文字之间需要一个或多个空格。

trans-unit.source: "always" - Requires one or more spaces inside of the curly brace pair.
trans-unit.target: "always" -在花括号对内需要一个或多个空格。

trans-unit.source: "always" disallows all assignments in test conditions
trans-unit.target: "always" 不允许测试条件下的所有作业

trans-unit.source: "always" does not require spaces or newlines in empty array literals []
trans-unit.target: "always" 在空数组文字中不需要空格或换行符 []

trans-unit.source: "always" enforces a newline around variable declarations
trans-unit.target: "always" 围绕变量声明强制换行

trans-unit.source: "always" enforces a space inside of object and array literals
trans-unit.target: "always" 在对象和数组文字内部强制使用空格

trans-unit.source: "always" enforces a space inside of parentheses
trans-unit.target: "always" 在括号内加一个空格

trans-unit.source: "always" enforces braces around the function body
trans-unit.target: "always" 在功能主体周围使用花括号

trans-unit.source: "always" enforces parenthesis after a new constructor with no arguments (default)
trans-unit.target: "always" 在没有参数的新构造函数之后，“总是”强制使用括号（默认）

trans-unit.source: "always" enforces providing a radix (default)
trans-unit.target: "always" 强制提供基数（默认）

trans-unit.source: "always" files must begin with the Unicode BOM
trans-unit.target: "always" 文件必须以Unicode BOM开始

trans-unit.source: "always" require named generators
trans-unit.target: "always" 需要命名生成器

trans-unit.source: "always" requires line breaks inside all function parentheses.
trans-unit.target: "always" 要求在所有函数括号内使用换行符。

trans-unit.source: "always" requires line breaks inside braces
trans-unit.target: "always" 要求括号内有换行符

trans-unit.source: "always" requires line breaks inside brackets
trans-unit.target: "always" 要求括号内有换行符

trans-unit.source: "always" requires one or more blank lines. Note it does not count lines that comments exist as blank lines.
trans-unit.target: "always" 需要一个或多个空行。请注意，它不将注释存在的行视为空白行。

trans-unit.source: "always" requires one or more spaces inside computed property brackets
trans-unit.target: "always" 在计算的属性括号内需要一个或多个空格

trans-unit.source: "always" requires one or more spaces or newlines inside array brackets
trans-unit.target: "always" 在数组括号内需要一个或多个空格或换行符

trans-unit.source: "always" requires space between the function name and the opening parenthesis.
trans-unit.target: "always" 要求函数名称和左括号之间有空格。

trans-unit.source: "always" requires spacing inside of braces (except {})
trans-unit.target: "always" 要求括号内有空格（ {} 除外）

trans-unit.source: "always" requires trailing commas
trans-unit.target: "always" 需要结尾逗号

trans-unit.source: "always"(default) require an empty line after class members
trans-unit.target: "always" （默认）在类成员之后要求空行

trans-unit.source: "always-multiline" enforces newlines between the operands of a ternary expression if the expression spans multiple lines.
trans-unit.target: "always-multiline" 如果表达式跨越多行，则“ always-multiline”在三元表达式的操作数之间强制换行。

trans-unit.source: "always-multiline" requires trailing commas when the last element or property is in a different line than the closing ] or } and disallows trailing commas when the last element or property is on the same line as the closing ] or }
trans-unit.target: "always-multiline" 需要尾随逗号时的最后一个元素或属性是一个不同的线比闭合 ] 或 } 和不允许尾随逗号时的最后一个元素或属性是基于相同行闭合 ] 或 }

trans-unit.source: "any" (default) - If any variables in destructuring should be const, this rule warns for those variables.
trans-unit.target: "any" （默认值）-如果解构中的任何变量应为 const ，则此规则会针对这些变量发出警告。

trans-unit.source: "any" does not enforce the position of a single-line statement.
trans-unit.target: "any" 不强制执行单行语句的位置。

trans-unit.source: "any" enforces always wrapping, but allows either style.
trans-unit.target: "any" 强制始终包装，但允许任一种样式。

trans-unit.source: "any" just ignores the statement pair.
trans-unit.target: "any" 仅忽略语句对。

trans-unit.source: "anyOrder" (default) does not enforce order.
trans-unit.target: "anyOrder" （默认）不强制执行订单。

trans-unit.source: "applyDefaultIgnorePatterns" enables or disables the default comment patterns to be ignored by the rule
trans-unit.target: "applyDefaultIgnorePatterns" 启用或禁用规则将忽略的默认注释模式

trans-unit.source: "arraysInArrays": false disallows spaces between brackets of array literals and brackets of their array literal elements [[ or ]]
trans-unit.target: "arraysInArrays": false 不允许在数组文字的括号和其数组文字元素的括号 [[ 或 ]] 之间使用空格

trans-unit.source: "arraysInArrays": true requires one or more spaces or newlines between brackets of array literals and brackets of their array literal elements [ [ or ] ]
trans-unit.target: "arraysInArrays": true 要求在数组文字的括号及其数组文字元素的括号 [ [ 或 ] ] 一个或多个空格或换行符

trans-unit.source: "arraysInObjects": false disallows spacing inside of braces of objects beginning and/or ending with an array element (applies when the first option is set to always)
trans-unit.target: "arraysInObjects": false 不允许在对象大括号内以数组元素开头和/或结尾的空格（当第一个选项设置为 always 时适用）

trans-unit.source: "arraysInObjects": true requires spacing inside of braces of objects beginning and/or ending with an array element (applies when the first option is set to never)
trans-unit.target: "arraysInObjects": true 要求在对象大括号内以数组元素开头和/或结尾的空格（当第一个选项设置为 never 时适用）

trans-unit.source: "arrowFunctions" - Arrow functions.
trans-unit.target: "arrowFunctions" -箭头功能。

trans-unit.source: "as-needed" disallows providing the 10 radix
trans-unit.target: "as-needed" 不允许提供 10 个基数

trans-unit.source: "as-needed" disallows quotes around object literal property names that are not strictly required
trans-unit.target: "as-needed" 不允许在对象文字属性名称中使用并非严格要求的引号

trans-unit.source: "as-needed" enforces no braces where they can be omitted (default)
trans-unit.target: "as-needed" 不会在可以省略的地方使用大括号（默认）

trans-unit.source: "as-needed" enforces no braces where they can be omitted.
trans-unit.target: "as-needed" 不会在可以省略的位置使用大括号。

trans-unit.source: "as-needed" require named generators if the name cannot be assigned automatically in an ES6 environment.
trans-unit.target: "as-needed" 如果不能在ES6环境中自动分配名称，则“按需”需要命名生成器。

trans-unit.source: "as-needed" requires function expressions to have a name, if the name cannot be assigned automatically in an ES6 environment
trans-unit.target: "as-needed" 如果不能在ES6环境中自动分配名称，则“按需”要求函数表达式具有名称

trans-unit.source: "asc" (default) - enforce properties to be in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: "asc" （默认）-强制属性以升序排列。

trans-unit.source: "avoidEscape": true allows strings to use single-quotes or double-quotes so long as the string contains a quote that would have to be escaped otherwise
trans-unit.target: "avoidEscape": true 允许字符串使用单引号或双引号，只要字符串包含必须转义的引号

trans-unit.source: "avoidExplicitReturnArrows": true indicates that methods are preferred over explicit-return arrow functions for function properties. (By default, the rule allows either of these.) Note that this option can only be enabled when the string option is set to "always" or "methods".
trans-unit.target: "avoidExplicitReturnArrows": true 表示对于函数属性，方法优于显式返回箭头函数。（默认情况下，该规则允许其中任何一个。）请注意，只有在string选项设置为 "always" 或 "methods" 时，才能启用此选项。

trans-unit.source: "avoidQuotes": true indicates that long-form syntax is preferred whenever the object key is a string literal (default: false). Note that this option can only be enabled when the string option is set to "always", "methods", or "properties".
trans-unit.target: "avoidQuotes": true 表示只要对象键是字符串文字（默认值： false ），则首选长格式语法。请注意，仅当string选项设置为 "always" ， "methods" 或 "properties" 时，才能启用此选项。

trans-unit.source: "backtick" requires the use of backticks wherever possible
trans-unit.target: "backtick" 要求尽可能使用反引号

trans-unit.source: "bare-block": Disallows consecutive line comments in favor of block comments, and disallows block comments from having a "*" character before each line.
trans-unit.target: "bare-block" ：禁止连续的行注释，而以块注释为准，并且不允许块注释在每行之前都带有 "*" 字符。

trans-unit.source: "before": false (Default) disallows before colons.
trans-unit.target: "before": false （默认）不允许在冒号之前。

trans-unit.source: "before": false (default) disallows spaces before commas
trans-unit.target: "before": false （默认）不允许在逗号前加空格

trans-unit.source: "before": false disallows spaces before keywords
trans-unit.target: "before": false 不允许在关键字前加空格

trans-unit.source: "before": true (default) requires at least one space before keywords
trans-unit.target: "before": true （默认）在关键字之前至少需要一个空格

trans-unit.source: "before": true requires one or more spaces before colons.
trans-unit.target: "before": true 需要在冒号之前一个或多个空格。

trans-unit.source: "before": true requires one or more spaces before commas
trans-unit.target: "before": true 要求逗号前必须有一个或多个空格

trans-unit.source: "before" requires linebreaks to be placed before the operator
trans-unit.target: "before" 要求将换行符放置在运算符之前

trans-unit.source: "beforeBlockComment": true (default) requires an empty line before block comments
trans-unit.target: "beforeBlockComment": true （默认），在块注释之前需要空行

trans-unit.source: "beforeLineComment": true requires an empty line before line comments
trans-unit.target: "beforeLineComment": true 要求在行注释之前留空行

trans-unit.source: "beforeStatementContinuationChars": "always" requires semicolons at the end of statements if the next line starts with [, (, /, +, or -.
trans-unit.target: "beforeStatementContinuationChars": "always" 如果下一行以 [ ， ( ， / ， + 或 - 开头），则“始终”在语句末尾需要分号。

trans-unit.source: "beforeStatementContinuationChars": "any" (default) ignores semicolons (or lacking semicolon) at the end of statements if the next line starts with [, (, /, +, or -.
trans-unit.target: "beforeStatementContinuationChars": "any" 如果下一行以 [ ， ( ， / ， + 或 - )开头，则“ any”（默认）在语句末尾忽略分号（或缺少分号）。

trans-unit.source: "beforeStatementContinuationChars": "never" disallows semicolons as the end of statements if it doesn't make ASI hazard even if the next line starts with [, (, /, +, or -.
trans-unit.target: "beforeStatementContinuationChars": "never" 即使从下一行以 [ ， ( ， / ， + 或 - 开头）也不会对ASI造成危害，“ never”禁止将分号作为语句的结尾。

trans-unit.source: "below", { "overrides": { "do": "any" } } disallows all single-line statements from appearing on the same line as their parent, unless the parent is a do-while statement, in which case the position of the single-line statement is not enforced.
trans-unit.target: "below", { "overrides": { "do": "any" } } 禁止所有单行语句与其父级出现在同一行，除非父级是 do-while 语句，在这种情况下，位置单行语句的不会强制执行。

trans-unit.source: "below" requires a newline before a single-line statement.
trans-unit.target: "below" 在单行语句之前需要换行符。

trans-unit.source: "below" requires a newline before an arrow function body.
trans-unit.target: "below" 在箭头功能主体之前需要换行符。

trans-unit.source: "beside", { "overrides": { "while": "below" } } requires all single-line statements to appear on the same line as their parent, unless the parent is a while statement, in which case the single-line statement must not be on the same line.
trans-unit.target: "beside", { "overrides": { "while": "below" } } 要求所有单行语句与它们的父行出现在同一行，除非父行是 while 语句，在这种情况下，单行语句不能在同一行。

trans-unit.source: "beside" (default) disallows a newline before a single-line statement.
trans-unit.target: "beside" （默认）在单行语句之前不允许换行。

trans-unit.source: "beside" (default) disallows a newline before an arrow function body.
trans-unit.target: "beside" （默认）不允许在箭头函数正文之前使用换行符。

trans-unit.source: "block" is lonely blocks.
trans-unit.target: "block" 是孤独的块。

trans-unit.source: "block-like" is block like statements. This matches statements that the last token is the closing brace of blocks; e.g. { }, if (a) { }, and while (a) { }. Also matches immediately invoked function expression statements.
trans-unit.target: "block-like" 是块状语句。这与以下语句匹配：最后一个标记是块的右大括号；例如 { } ， if (a) { } ， while (a) { } 。还匹配立即调用的函数表达式语句。

trans-unit.source: "blocks" require or disallow padding within block statements
trans-unit.target: "blocks" 要求或禁止在块语句中填充

trans-unit.source: "boolean" (true by default) - When this is true, this rule warns shorter type conversions for boolean type.
trans-unit.target: "boolean" （ true 默认） -如果这是 true ，这条规则警告较短的类型转换 boolean 类型。

trans-unit.source: "both" disallows function and var declarations in nested blocks
trans-unit.target: "both" 不允许嵌套块中的 function 和 var 声明

trans-unit.source: "break" is break statements.
trans-unit.target: "break" 是 break 语句。

trans-unit.source: "capIsConstructor": false (default true) disables the assumption that a function which name starts with an uppercase is a constructor.
trans-unit.target: "capIsConstructor": false （默认为 true ）禁用以下假设：以大写字母开头的函数是构造函数。

trans-unit.source: "capIsNew": false allows uppercase-started functions to be called without new operators.
trans-unit.target: "capIsNew": false 允许在不使用 new 运算符的情况下调用大写启动的函数。

trans-unit.source: "capIsNew": true (default) requires all uppercase-started functions to be called with new operators.
trans-unit.target: "capIsNew": true （默认）要求使用 new 运算符调用所有大写开头的函数。

trans-unit.source: "capIsNewExceptionPattern" allows any uppercase-started function names that match the specified regex pattern to be called without the new operator.
trans-unit.target: "capIsNewExceptionPattern" 允许在不使用 new 运算符的情况下调用与指定的正则表达式模式匹配的所有大写字母开头的函数名。

trans-unit.source: "capIsNewExceptions" allows specified uppercase-started function names to be called without the new operator.
trans-unit.target: "capIsNewExceptions" 允许在不使用 new 运算符的情况下调用指定的大写字母开头的函数名。

trans-unit.source: "case" is case labels.
trans-unit.target: "case" 是 case 标签。

trans-unit.source: "cjs-export" is export statements of CommonJS; e.g. module.exports = 0, module.exports.foo = 1, and exports.foo = 2. This is a special case of assignment.
trans-unit.target: "cjs-export" 是CommonJS的 export 语句；例如 module.exports = 0 ， module.exports.foo = 1 ，和 exports.foo = 2 。这是分配的特殊情况。

trans-unit.source: "cjs-import" is import statements of CommonJS; e.g. const foo = require("foo"). This is a special case of variable declarations.
trans-unit.target: "cjs-import" 是CommonJS的 import 语句；例如 const foo = require("foo") 。这是变量声明的特殊情况。

trans-unit.source: "class" is class declarations.
trans-unit.target: "class" 是 class 声明。

trans-unit.source: "classes" require or disallow padding within classes
trans-unit.target: "classes" 要求或禁止在类内进行填充

trans-unit.source: "code" (default 80) enforces a maximum line length
trans-unit.target: "code" （默认为 80 ）强制最大行长

trans-unit.source: "colon" enforces horizontal alignment of both colons and values in object literals.
trans-unit.target: "colon" 强制将对象文字中的冒号和值进行水平对齐。

trans-unit.source: "comments" enforces a maximum line length for comments; defaults to value of code
trans-unit.target: "comments" 强制注释的最大行长；默认为 code 值

trans-unit.source: "conditionalAssign": false allows extra parentheses around assignments in conditional test expressions
trans-unit.target: "conditionalAssign": false 允许在条件测试表达式中的赋值周围加上括号

trans-unit.source: "consecutive" allows multiple variable declarations per scope but requires consecutive variable declarations to be combined into a single declaration
trans-unit.target: "consecutive" 允许每个作用域有多个变量声明，但需要将连续的变量声明合并为一个声明

trans-unit.source: "consistent": true (default) requires that either both curly braces, or neither, directly enclose newlines. Note that enabling this option will also change the behavior of the minProperties option. (See minProperties above for more information)
trans-unit.target: "consistent": true （默认）要求两个花括号或两个花括号都不直接包含换行符。请注意，启用此选项还将更改 minProperties 选项的行为。（有关更多信息，请参见上面的 minProperties ）

trans-unit.source: "consistent" enforces a consistent quote style; in a given object, either all of the properties should be quoted, or none of the properties should be quoted
trans-unit.target: "consistent" 强制使用一致的引用样式；在给定对象中，要么所有属性都应加引号，要么所有属性均不引号

trans-unit.source: "consistent" ensures that either all shorthand or all long-form will be used in an object literal.
trans-unit.target: "consistent" 确保在对象文字中使用所有速记形式或所有长格式。

trans-unit.source: "consistent" requires consistent usage of line breaks between arguments
trans-unit.target: "consistent" 要求在参数之间一致使用换行符

trans-unit.source: "consistent" requires consistent usage of linebreaks between array elements
trans-unit.target: "consistent" 要求一致使用数组元素之间的换行符

trans-unit.source: "consistent" requires consistent usage of linebreaks for each pair of brackets. It reports an error if one bracket in the pair has a linebreak inside it and the other bracket does not.
trans-unit.target: "consistent" 要求对每对括号使用一致的换行符。如果该对中的一个方括号内有换行符，而另一个方括号内没有换行符，则会报告错误。

trans-unit.source: "consistent" requires consistent usage of linebreaks for each pair of parentheses. It reports an error if one parenthesis in the pair has a linebreak inside it and the other parenthesis does not.
trans-unit.target: "consistent" 要求对每对括号使用一致的换行符。如果该对中的一个括号内有换行符，而另一个括号内没有换行符，则会报告错误。

trans-unit.source: "consistent-as-needed" ensures that either all shorthand or all long-form will be used in an object literal, but ensures all shorthand whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: "consistent-as-needed" 可确保在对象文字中使用所有速记形式或所有长形式，但在可能的情况下确保所有速记形式。

trans-unit.source: "consistent-as-needed" requires quotes around all object literal property names if any name strictly requires quotes, otherwise disallows quotes around object property names
trans-unit.target: "consistent-as-needed" 如果任何名称严格要求使用引号，则“按需一致”要求在所有对象文字属性名称周围加上引号，否则不允许在对象属性名称周围使用引号

trans-unit.source: "const": "always" requires one const declaration per block
trans-unit.target: "const": "always" 每块需要一个 const 声明

trans-unit.source: "const": "consecutive" requires consecutive const declarations to be a single declaration
trans-unit.target: "const": "consecutive" 要求连续的 const 声明是一个声明

trans-unit.source: "const": "never" requires multiple const declarations per block
trans-unit.target: "const": "never" 每个块需要多个 const 声明

trans-unit.source: "const" is const variable declarations, both single-line and multiline.
trans-unit.target: "const" 是单行和多行的 const 变量声明。

trans-unit.source: "constructors" - Class constructors.
trans-unit.target: "constructors" -类构造函数。

trans-unit.source: "continue" is continue statements.
trans-unit.target: "continue" 是 continue 声明。

trans-unit.source: "debugger" is debugger statements.
trans-unit.target: "debugger" 是 debugger 语句。

trans-unit.source: "declaration" requires the use of function declarations instead of function expressions
trans-unit.target: "declaration" 要求使用函数声明而不是函数表达式

trans-unit.source: "default" is default labels.
trans-unit.target: "default" 是 default 标签。

trans-unit.source: "defaultAssignment": false disallows the conditional expression as a default assignment pattern
trans-unit.target: "defaultAssignment": false 不允许条件表达式作为默认分配模式

trans-unit.source: "defaultAssignment": true (default) allows the conditional expression as a default assignment pattern
trans-unit.target: "defaultAssignment": true （默认）允许条件表达式作为默认分配模式

trans-unit.source: "desc" - enforce properties to be in descending order.
trans-unit.target: "desc" -强制属性以降序排列。

trans-unit.source: "directive" is directive prologues. This matches directives; e.g. "use strict".
trans-unit.target: "directive" 是指令序言。这与指令匹配；例如 "use strict" 。

trans-unit.source: "do" is do-while statements. This matches all statements that the first token is do keyword.
trans-unit.target: "do" 是 do-while 语句。这匹配所有第一个标记是 do 关键字的语句。

trans-unit.source: "double" (default) requires the use of double quotes wherever possible
trans-unit.target: "double" （默认）要求尽可能使用双引号

trans-unit.source: "empty" is empty statements.
trans-unit.target: "empty" 是空语句。

trans-unit.source: "enforceForArrowConditionals": false allows extra parentheses around ternary expressions which are the body of an arrow function
trans-unit.target: "enforceForArrowConditionals": false 允许在三元表达式（它是箭头函数的主体）周围附加括号

trans-unit.source: "enforceForClassMembers": true additionally applies this rule to class members (default is false)
trans-unit.target: "enforceForClassMembers": true 还将此规则应用于类成员（默认为 false ）

trans-unit.source: "enforceForIndexOf" when set to true disallows the use of indexOf and lastIndexOf methods with NaN. Default is false, meaning that this rule by default does not warn about indexOf(NaN) or lastIndexOf(NaN) method calls.
trans-unit.target: "enforceForIndexOf" 设置为 true 时，“ enforceForIndexOf”不允许 NaN 使用 indexOf 和 lastIndexOf 方法。默认值为 false ，这意味着默认情况下此规则不警告 indexOf(NaN) 或 lastIndexOf(NaN) 方法调用。

trans-unit.source: "enforceForNewInMemberExpressions": false allows extra parentheses around new expressions in member expressions
trans-unit.target: "enforceForNewInMemberExpressions": false 允许在成员表达式中的 new 表达式周围附加括号

trans-unit.source: "enforceForOrderingRelations": false (default) allows negation of the left-hand side of ordering relational operators (<, >, <=, >=)
trans-unit.target: "enforceForOrderingRelations": false （默认值）允许否定排序关系运算符（ < ， > ， <= ， >= ）的左侧

trans-unit.source: "enforceForOrderingRelations": true disallows negation of the left-hand side of ordering relational operators
trans-unit.target: "enforceForOrderingRelations": true 不允许否定排序关系运算符的左侧

trans-unit.source: "enforceForSequenceExpressions": false allows extra parentheses around sequence expressions
trans-unit.target: "enforceForSequenceExpressions": false 允许在序列表达式周围加括号

trans-unit.source: "enforceForSwitchCase" when set to true disallows case NaN and switch(NaN) in switch statements. Default is false, meaning that this rule by default does not warn about case NaN or switch(NaN).
trans-unit.target: "enforceForSwitchCase" 设置为 true 时，“ enforceForSwitchCase”不允许在 switch 语句中使用 case NaN 和 switch(NaN) 。默认值为 false ，这意味着默认情况下此规则不警告 case NaN 或 switch(NaN) 。

trans-unit.source: "enforceInMethodNames": false (default) allows dangling underscores in method names
trans-unit.target: "enforceInMethodNames": false （默认），允许在方法名称中悬挂下划线

trans-unit.source: "error" or 2 - turn the rule on as an error (exit code is 1 when triggered)
trans-unit.target: "error" 或 2 -将规则作为错误打开（触发时退出代码为1）

trans-unit.source: "error" or 2 - turn the rule on as an error (exit code will be 1)
trans-unit.target: "error" 或 2 -将规则作为错误打开（退出代码将为1）

trans-unit.source: "except-parens" (default) allows assignments in test conditions only if they are enclosed in parentheses (for example, to allow reassigning a variable in the test of a while or do...while loop)
trans-unit.target: "except-parens" （默认值）仅在括号中括起来时才允许在测试条件中进行赋值（例如，允许在 while 或 do...while 循环的测试中重新分配变量）

trans-unit.source: "exceptAfterSingleLine": false(default) do not skip checking empty lines after single-line class members
trans-unit.target: "exceptAfterSingleLine": false （默认），在单行类成员之后不跳过检查空行

trans-unit.source: "exceptAfterSingleLine": true skip checking empty lines after single-line class members
trans-unit.target: "exceptAfterSingleLine": true 跳过单行类成员后检查空行

trans-unit.source: "exceptions": { "Property": true } ("Property" is the only node specified by default) specifies nodes to ignore
trans-unit.target: "exceptions": { "Property": true } （ "Property" 是默认指定的唯一节点）指定要忽略的节点

trans-unit.source: "exceptions" allows an array of specified identifier names
trans-unit.target: "exceptions" 允许指定标识符名称的数组

trans-unit.source: "exceptions" has properties whose names correspond to node types in the abstract syntax tree (AST) of JavaScript code:
trans-unit.target: "exceptions" 具有其名称与JavaScript代码的抽象语法树（AST）中的节点类型相对应的属性：

trans-unit.source: "export" is export declarations.
trans-unit.target: "export" 是 export 报关单。

trans-unit.source: "expression" (default) requires the use of function expressions instead of function declarations
trans-unit.target: "expression" （默认）要求使用函数表达式而不是函数声明

trans-unit.source: "expression" is expression statements.
trans-unit.target: "expression" 是表达式语句。

trans-unit.source: "first" enforces that semicolons are at the beginning of statements. Semicolons of for loop heads (for(a;b;c){}) should be at the end of lines even if you use this option.
trans-unit.target: "first" 强制将分号放在语句的开头。即使使用此选项， for 循环头（ for(a;b;c){} ）的分号也应位于行的末尾。

trans-unit.source: "first" requires a comma before and on the same line as an array element, object property, or variable declaration
trans-unit.target: "first" 在与数组元素，对象属性或变量声明相同的行之前和同一行需要逗号

trans-unit.source: "flatTernaryExpressions": true (false by default) requires no indentation for ternary expressions which are nested in other ternary expressions.
trans-unit.target: "flatTernaryExpressions": true （默认为 false ）对于嵌套在其他三元表达式中的三元表达式不需要缩进。

trans-unit.source: "for" is for loop families. This matches all statements that the first token is for keyword.
trans-unit.target: "for" 是 for 循环家庭。这与第一个标记 for 关键字的所有语句匹配。

trans-unit.source: "function" is function declarations.
trans-unit.target: "function" 是功能声明。

trans-unit.source: "function" otherwise
trans-unit.target: "function" 否则为“功能”

trans-unit.source: "function" requires one strict mode directive in each top-level function declaration or expression (and disallows any other strict mode directives)
trans-unit.target: "function" 在每个顶级函数声明或表达式中都需要一个严格模式指令（并且不允许其他任何严格模式指令）

trans-unit.source: "functionPrototypeMethods": true additionally enforces wrapping function expressions invoked using .call and .apply. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: "functionPrototypeMethods": true 额外强制使用包装函数表达式调用 .call 和 .apply 。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: "functions" (default) disallows function declarations in nested blocks
trans-unit.target: "functions" （默认）不允许在嵌套块中进行 function 声明

trans-unit.source: "functions" - Normal functions.
trans-unit.target: "functions" -正常功能。

trans-unit.source: "functions" disallows unnecessary parentheses only around function expressions
trans-unit.target: "functions" 仅在函数表达式周围不允许不必要的括号

trans-unit.source: "generatorFunctions" - Generator functions.
trans-unit.target: "generatorFunctions" -生成器函数。

trans-unit.source: "generatorMethods" - Class methods and method shorthands of object literals with generator.
trans-unit.target: "generatorMethods" -类方法和带有生成器的对象文字的方法简写。

trans-unit.source: "getBeforeSet" if a property has both getter and setter, requires the getter to be defined before the setter.
trans-unit.target: "getBeforeSet" 如果属性同时具有getter和setter，则“ getBeforeSet”要求在getter之前定义getter。

trans-unit.source: "getWithoutSet": true will also warn for getters without setters in classes.
trans-unit.target: "getWithoutSet": true 也将警告类中没有setter的getter。

trans-unit.source: "getters" - Getters.
trans-unit.target: "getters" -吸气剂。

trans-unit.source: "global" if ESLint considers a file to be a CommonJS module
trans-unit.target: "global" 如果ESLint认为文件是CommonJS模块，则为“全局”

trans-unit.source: "global" requires one strict mode directive in the global scope (and disallows any other strict mode directives)
trans-unit.target: "global" 在全局范围内需要一个严格模式指令（并且不允许任何其他严格模式指令）

trans-unit.source: "globalReturn": true property in the ecmaFeatures object of parser options
trans-unit.target: "globalReturn": true 解析器选项的 ecmaFeatures 对象中的true属性

trans-unit.source: "if" is if statements.
trans-unit.target: "if" 是 if 语句。

trans-unit.source: "ignoreCase": true (default false) ignores the case-sensitivity of the variables order
trans-unit.target: "ignoreCase": true （默认为 false ）忽略变量order的区分大小写

trans-unit.source: "ignoreChainWithDepth" (default: 2) allows chains up to a specified depth.
trans-unit.target: "ignoreChainWithDepth" （默认值： 2 ）允许链达到指定深度。

trans-unit.source: "ignoreComments": false (default) disallows trailing whitespace in comment blocks
trans-unit.target: "ignoreComments": false （默认）不允许在注释块中尾随空白

trans-unit.source: "ignoreComments": true allows trailing whitespace in comment blocks
trans-unit.target: "ignoreComments": true 允许在注释块中尾随空白

trans-unit.source: "ignoreComments": true ignores all trailing comments and comments on their own line
trans-unit.target: "ignoreComments": true 忽略所有尾随的注释以及它们各自行上的注释

trans-unit.source: "ignoreComments" (default: false) can be used when comments do not need to be aligned with nodes on the previous or next line.
trans-unit.target: "ignoreComments" 当注释不需要与上一行或下一行上的节点对齐时，可以使用“ ignoreComments”（默认值：false）。

trans-unit.source: "ignoreConstructors": true can be used to prevent the rule from reporting errors for constructor functions. (By default, the rule treats constructors the same way as other functions.) Note that this option can only be enabled when the string option is set to "always" or "methods".
trans-unit.target: "ignoreConstructors": true 可用于防止规则报告构造函数的错误。（默认情况下，该规则对待构造函数的方式与其他函数相同。）请注意，只有在string选项设置为 "always" 或 "methods" 时，才能启用此选项。

trans-unit.source: "ignoreDestructuring": false (default) enforces id-match for destructured identifiers
trans-unit.target: "ignoreDestructuring": false （默认值）对已分解的标识符强制执行 id-match

trans-unit.source: "ignoreDestructuring": false (default) enforces camelcase style for destructured identifiers
trans-unit.target: "ignoreDestructuring": false （默认值）对已分解的标识符强制使用驼峰样式

trans-unit.source: "ignoreDestructuring": true does not check destructured identifiers
trans-unit.target: "ignoreDestructuring": true 不检查解构的标识符

trans-unit.source: "ignoreDestructuring": true does not check destructured identifiers (but still checks any use of those identifiers later in the code)
trans-unit.target: "ignoreDestructuring": true 不检查解构的标识符（但稍后在代码中仍然检查对这些标识符的任何使用）

trans-unit.source: "ignoreEOLComments": true (defaults to false) ignores multiple spaces before comments that occur at the end of lines
trans-unit.target: "ignoreEOLComments": true （默认为 false ）忽略行末尾的注释之前的多个空格

trans-unit.source: "ignoreImports": false (default) enforces camelcase style for ES2015 imports
trans-unit.target: "ignoreImports": false （默认）为ES2015导入强制使用驼峰样式

trans-unit.source: "ignoreImports": true does not check ES2015 imports (but still checks any use of the imports later in the code except function arguments)
trans-unit.target: "ignoreImports": true 不检查ES2015导入（但稍后会在代码中检查除函数参数以外的任何导入使用）

trans-unit.source: "ignoreJSX": "none|all|multi-line|single-line" allows extra parentheses around no/all/multi-line/single-line JSX components. Defaults to none.
trans-unit.target: "ignoreJSX": "none|all|multi-line|single-line" 允许在no / all / multi-line / single-line JSX组件周围附加括号。默认为 none 。

trans-unit.source: "ignorePattern" custom patterns to be ignored by the rule
trans-unit.target: "ignorePattern" 规则将忽略“ ignorePattern”定制模式

trans-unit.source: "ignorePattern" ignores lines matching a regular expression; can only match a single line and need to be double escaped when written in YAML or JSON
trans-unit.target: "ignorePattern" 忽略与正则表达式匹配的行；只能匹配单行，并且在以YAML或JSON编写时需要两次转义

trans-unit.source: "ignoreRegExpLiterals": true ignores lines that contain a RegExp literal
trans-unit.target: "ignoreRegExpLiterals": true 忽略包含RegExp文字的行

trans-unit.source: "ignoreStrings": true ignores lines that contain a double-quoted or single-quoted string
trans-unit.target: "ignoreStrings": true 忽略包含双引号或单引号字符串的行

trans-unit.source: "ignoreTemplateLiterals": true ignores lines that contain a template literal
trans-unit.target: "ignoreTemplateLiterals": true 忽略包含模板文字的行

trans-unit.source: "ignoreTopLevelFunctions": true ignores top-level functions
trans-unit.target: "ignoreTopLevelFunctions": true 忽略顶级函数

trans-unit.source: "ignoreTrailingComments": true ignores only trailing comments
trans-unit.target: "ignoreTrailingComments": true 只忽略结尾的注释

trans-unit.source: "ignoreUrls": true ignores lines that contain a URL
trans-unit.target: "ignoreUrls": true 忽略包含URL的行

trans-unit.source: "ignoredNodes" accepts an array of selectors. If an AST node is matched by any of the selectors, the indentation of tokens which are direct children of that node will be ignored. This can be used as an escape hatch to relax the rule if you disagree with the indentation that it enforces for a particular syntactic pattern.
trans-unit.target: "ignoredNodes" 接受选择器数组。如果AST节点被任何选择器匹配，则作为该节点的直接子代的令牌缩进将被忽略。如果您不同意针对特定句法模式所强制执行的缩进，则可以将其用作逃逸填充以放松规则。

trans-unit.source: "iife" is immediately invoked function expression statements. This matches calls on a function expression, optionally prefixed with a unary operator.
trans-unit.target: "iife" 是立即调用函数表达式的语句。这匹配函数表达式上的调用，可选地以一元运算符为前缀。

trans-unit.source: "impliedStrict": true property in the ecmaFeatures object
trans-unit.target: "impliedStrict": true ecmaFeatures 对象中的true属性

trans-unit.source: "import" is import declarations.
trans-unit.target: "import" 是 import 声明。

trans-unit.source: "initializations" (default) enforces a newline around variable initializations
trans-unit.target: "initializations" （默认）在变量初始化周围强制换行

trans-unit.source: "initialized": "always" requires one variable declaration for initialized variables per scope
trans-unit.target: "initialized": "always" 要求每个范围的一个已初始化变量的变量声明

trans-unit.source: "initialized": "consecutive" requires consecutive variable declarations for initialized variables to be a single declaration
trans-unit.target: "initialized": "consecutive" 要求连续变量声明，将初始化变量作为单个声明

trans-unit.source: "initialized": "never" requires multiple variable declarations for initialized variables per scope
trans-unit.target: "initialized": "never" 要求每个范围的初始化变量有多个变量声明

trans-unit.source: "inside" enforces always wrapping the function expression.
trans-unit.target: "inside" 强制始终包装函数表达式。

trans-unit.source: "int32Hint": Allows the use of bitwise OR in |0 pattern for type casting.
trans-unit.target: "int32Hint" ：允许在 |0 模式中使用按位OR 进行类型转换。

trans-unit.source: "keywords": true requires quotes around language keywords used as object property names (only applies when using as-needed or consistent-as-needed)
trans-unit.target: "keywords": true 要求将用作对象属性名称的语言关键字加上引号（仅在 as-needed 或按需 consistent-as-needed 时适用）

trans-unit.source: "last" (Default) enforces that semicolons are at the end of statements.
trans-unit.target: "last" （默认）强制分号位于语句的末尾。

trans-unit.source: "last" (default) requires a comma after and on the same line as an array element, object property, or variable declaration
trans-unit.target: "last" （默认）在与数组元素，对象属性或变量声明相同的行之后和同一行需要逗号

trans-unit.source: "layout" means the rule cares primarily about whitespace, semicolons, commas, and parentheses, all the parts of the program that determine how the code looks rather than how it executes. These rules work on parts of the code that aren't specified in the AST.
trans-unit.target: "layout" 是指规则主要关心空格，分号，逗号和括号，这是程序的所有部分，它们决定代码的外观而不是代码的执行方式。这些规则适用于AST中未指定的部分代码。

trans-unit.source: "let": "always" requires one let declaration per block
trans-unit.target: "let": "always" 每块需要一个 let 声明

trans-unit.source: "let": "consecutive" requires consecutive let declarations to be a single declaration
trans-unit.target: "let": "consecutive" 要求连续的 let 声明为单个声明

trans-unit.source: "let": "never" requires multiple let declarations per block
trans-unit.target: "let": "never" 每个块需要多个 let 声明

trans-unit.source: "let" is let variable declarations, both single-line and multiline.
trans-unit.target: "let" 是 let 变量声明，单和多行。

trans-unit.source: "location": optional string that configures where in your comments to check for matches. Defaults to "start". The other value is match anywhere in comments.
trans-unit.target: "location" ：可选字符串，用于配置注释中检查匹配项的位置。默认为 "start" 。另一个值与注释中的 anywhere 匹配。

trans-unit.source: "matchDescription" specifies (as a string) a regular expression to match the description in each JSDoc comment (for example, ".+" requires a description; this option does not apply to descriptions in parameter or return tags)
trans-unit.target: "matchDescription" 指定（作为字符串）正则表达式以匹配每个JSDoc注释中的描述（例如， ".+" 需要描述；此选项不适用于参数或返回标记中的描述）

trans-unit.source: "max" (default 10) enforces a maximum depth that callbacks can be nested
trans-unit.target: "max" （默认值为 10 ）强制设置可嵌套回调的最大深度

trans-unit.source: "max" (default 10) enforces a maximum number of statements allows in function blocks
trans-unit.target: "max" （默认值为 10 ）强制执行功能块中允许的最大语句数

trans-unit.source: "max" (default 300) enforces a maximum number of lines in a file
trans-unit.target: "max" （默认为 300 ）强制文件中的最大行数

trans-unit.source: "max" (default 3) enforces a maximum number of parameters in function definitions
trans-unit.target: "max" （默认值为 3 ）强制在函数定义中使用最大数量的参数

trans-unit.source: "max" (default 4) enforces a maximum depth that blocks can be nested
trans-unit.target: "max" （默认值为 4 ）强制执行可嵌套块的最大深度

trans-unit.source: "max" (default 50) enforces a maximum number of lines in a function.
trans-unit.target: "max" （默认值为 50 ）强制函数中的最大行数。

trans-unit.source: "max" (default: 2) enforces a maximum number of consecutive empty lines.
trans-unit.target: "max" （默认值： 2 ）强制使用最大连续空行数。

trans-unit.source: "max" (default: Infinity) enforces a maximum identifier length
trans-unit.target: "max" （默认值：Infinity）强制使用最大标识符长度

trans-unit.source: "maxBOF" enforces a maximum number of consecutive empty lines at the beginning of files.
trans-unit.target: "maxBOF" 在文件开头强制执行最大数量的连续空行。

trans-unit.source: "maxEOF" enforces a maximum number of consecutive empty lines at the end of files.
trans-unit.target: "maxEOF" 在文件末尾强制使用最大数量的连续空行。

trans-unit.source: "methods" - Class methods and method shorthands of object literals.
trans-unit.target: "methods" -类方法和对象文字的方法简写。

trans-unit.source: "methods" ensures the method shorthand is used (also applies to generators).
trans-unit.target: "methods" 确保使用速记方法（也适用于生成器）。

trans-unit.source: "min" (default: 2) enforces a minimum identifier length
trans-unit.target: "min" （默认值：2）强制最小标识符长度

trans-unit.source: "minItems": <number> requires line breaks if the number of elements is at least the given integer. If this is 0, this condition will act the same as the option "always". If this is null (the default), this condition is disabled.
trans-unit.target: "minItems": <number> 如果元素的数量至少为给定的整数，则<number>需要换行。如果为0，则此条件的作用与选项 "always" 。如果为 null （默认值），则禁用此条件。

trans-unit.source: "minItems": null (default) requires line breaks if the number of elements is at least the given integer. If this is 0, this condition will act the same as the option "always". If this is null (the default), this condition is disabled.
trans-unit.target: "minItems": null 如果元素的数量至少为给定的整数，则null（默认）要求换行。如果为0，则此条件的作用与选项 "always" 。如果为 null （默认值），则禁用此条件。

trans-unit.source: "minProperties" requires line breaks if the number of properties is at least the given integer. By default, an error will also be reported if an object contains linebreaks and has fewer properties than the given integer. However, the second behavior is disabled if the consistent option is set to true
trans-unit.target: "minProperties" 如果属性的数量至少为给定的整数，则“ minProperties”需要换行。默认情况下，如果对象包含换行符并且属性少于给定的整数，那么也会报告错误。但是，如果将 consistent 选项设置为 true ,则禁用第二个行为

trans-unit.source: "minimum": enforces one or more spaces before or after colons in object literals.
trans-unit.target: "minimum" ：在对象文字中的冒号之前或之后强制一个或多个空格。

trans-unit.source: "multiLine" specifies a spacing style for multi-line object literals.
trans-unit.target: "multiLine" 指定多行对象文字的间距样式。

trans-unit.source: "multiline": <boolean> requires line breaks if there are line breaks inside elements. If this is false, this condition is disabled.
trans-unit.target: "multiline": <boolean> 如果元素内部有换行符，则<boolean>需要换行符。如果为假，则禁用此条件。

trans-unit.source: "multiline": true (default) requires line breaks if there are line breaks inside elements or between elements. If this is false, this condition is disabled.
trans-unit.target: "multiline": true （默认），如果元素内部或元素之间存在换行符，则需要换行符。如果为假，则禁用此条件。

trans-unit.source: "multiline": true requires line breaks if there are line breaks inside properties or between properties. Otherwise, it disallows line breaks.
trans-unit.target: "multiline": true 如果属性内部或属性之间存在换行符，则true需要换行符。否则，它不允许换行。

trans-unit.source: "multiline" (default) requires linebreaks inside function parentheses if any of the parameters/arguments have a line break between them. Otherwise, it disallows linebreaks.
trans-unit.target: "multiline" 如果任何参数/参数之间有换行符，则“ multiline”（默认）在函数括号内需要换行符。否则，它不允许换行。

trans-unit.source: "multiline-arguments" works like multiline but allows linebreaks inside function parentheses if there is only one parameter/argument.
trans-unit.target: "multiline-arguments" 工作方式与 multiline 类似，但是如果只有一个参数/参数，则允许在函数括号内使用换行符。

trans-unit.source: "multiline-block-like" is block like statements. This is the same as block-like type, but only if the block is multiline.
trans-unit.target: "multiline-block-like" 是类似于块的语句。这与类似 block-like 类型相同，但仅当块为多行时。

trans-unit.source: "multiline-const" is multiline const variable declarations.
trans-unit.target: "multiline-const" 是多行 const 变量声明。

trans-unit.source: "multiline-expression" is expression statements. This is the same as expression type, but only if the statement is multiline.
trans-unit.target: "multiline-expression" 是表达式语句。这与 expression 类型相同，但仅在语句为多行时。

trans-unit.source: "multiline-let" is multiline let variable declarations.
trans-unit.target: "multiline-let" 是多行 let 变量声明。

trans-unit.source: "multiline-var" is multiline var variable declarations.
trans-unit.target: "multiline-var" 是多行 var 变量声明。

trans-unit.source: "nestedBinaryExpressions": false allows extra parentheses in nested binary expressions
trans-unit.target: "nestedBinaryExpressions": false 允许在嵌套二进制表达式中使用额外的括号

trans-unit.source: "never" (and also the exceptions to the "always" option) allows newlines inside array brackets, because this is a common pattern
trans-unit.target: "never" （以及 "always" 选项的例外）允许在数组括号内使用换行符，因为这是常见的模式

trans-unit.source: "never" (by default) - Disallows spaces inside of the curly brace pair.
trans-unit.target: "never" （默认情况下）-不允许在花括号对内使用空格。

trans-unit.source: "never" (default) - Disallows spaces between a tag function and its template literal.
trans-unit.target: "never" （默认）-禁止在标记函数及其模板文字之间使用空格。

trans-unit.source: "never" (default) disallows space between the function name and the opening parenthesis.
trans-unit.target: "never" （默认）不允许在函数名称和左括号之间使用空格。

trans-unit.source: "never" (default) disallows spaces inside array brackets
trans-unit.target: "never" （默认）不允许在数组括号内使用空格

trans-unit.source: "never" (default) disallows spaces inside computed property brackets
trans-unit.target: "never" （默认）不允许在计算的属性括号内添加空格

trans-unit.source: "never" (default) disallows spacing inside of braces
trans-unit.target: "never" （默认）不允许括号内有空格

trans-unit.source: "never" (default) disallows trailing commas
trans-unit.target: "never" （默认）不允许尾随逗号

trans-unit.source: "never" (default) enforces zero spaces inside of parentheses
trans-unit.target: "never" （默认）强制括号内的空格为零

trans-unit.source: "never" (default) files must not begin with the Unicode BOM
trans-unit.target: "never" （默认）文件不得以Unicode BOM开始

trans-unit.source: "never" disallow named generators where possible.
trans-unit.target: "never" 尽可能禁止命名生成器。

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows an empty line after class members
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许在班级成员之后空行

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows assignment operator shorthand
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许赋值运算符的简写

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows blank lines.
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许空白行。

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows blank newlines around directives.
trans-unit.target: "never" 禁止在指令周围使用空白换行符。

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows empty lines after var, let, or const
trans-unit.target: "never" 禁止在 var ， let 或 const 之后的空行

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows empty lines at the beginning and ending of block statements and classes
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许在块语句和类的开头和结尾处使用空行

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows line breaks between arguments
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许参数之间的换行符

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows line breaks between array elements
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许数组元素之间的换行

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows line breaks inside all function parentheses.
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许在所有函数括号内使用换行符。

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows line breaks inside braces
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许括号内出现换行

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows line breaks inside brackets
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许在括号内换行

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows named function expressions, except in recursive functions, where a name is needed
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许使用命名函数表达式，除非在递归函数中需要名称

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows newlines between the operands of a ternary expression (enforcing that the entire ternary expression is on one line).
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许三元表达式的操作数之间的换行符（强制整个三元表达式在一行上）。

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows semicolons as the end of statements (except to disambiguate statements beginning with [, (, /, +, or -)
trans-unit.target: "never" 禁止将分号作为语句的结尾（除了以 [ ， ( ， / ， + 或 - ）开头的歧义语句除外。

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows spaces
trans-unit.target: "never" 不允许空格

trans-unit.source: "never" disallows strict mode directives
trans-unit.target: "never" 禁止严格的模式指令

trans-unit.source: "never" enforces no braces around the function body (constrains arrow functions to the role of returning an expression)
trans-unit.target: "never" 在函数体周围不使用大括号（将箭头函数限制为返回表达式的角色）

trans-unit.source: "never" enforces no parenthesis after a new constructor with no arguments
trans-unit.target: "never" 在没有参数的新构造函数之后，“从不”不强制使用括号

trans-unit.source: "never" enforces that files do not end with a newline
trans-unit.target: "never" 强制文件不以换行符结尾

trans-unit.source: "never" enforces zero spaces inside of object and array literals (default)
trans-unit.target: "never" 在对象和数组文字内部强制使用零空格（默认）

trans-unit.source: "never" ensures that no property or method shorthand is used in any object literal.
trans-unit.target: "never" 确保任何对象文字中均不使用属性或方法的简写形式。

trans-unit.source: "never" requires multiple variable declarations per scope
trans-unit.target: "never" 要求每个作用域多个变量声明

trans-unit.source: "newIsCap": false allows new operators to be called with lowercase-started or uppercase-started functions.
trans-unit.target: "newIsCap": false 允许使用小写开头或大写开头的函数调用 new 运算符。

trans-unit.source: "newIsCap": true (default) requires all new operators to be called with uppercase-started functions.
trans-unit.target: "newIsCap": true （默认），要求所有 new 运算符都以大写字母开头的函数调用。

trans-unit.source: "newIsCapExceptionPattern" allows any lowercase-started function names that match the specified regex pattern to be called with the new operator.
trans-unit.target: "newIsCapExceptionPattern" 允许使用 new 运算符调用任何与指定正则表达式模式匹配的小写字母开头的函数名。

trans-unit.source: "newIsCapExceptions" allows specified lowercase-started function names to be called with the new operator.
trans-unit.target: "newIsCapExceptions" 允许使用 new 运算符调用指定的小写字母开头的函数名称。

trans-unit.source: "none" disallows linebreaks on either side of the operator
trans-unit.target: "none" 不允许在操作员的任何一侧换行

trans-unit.source: "null": Customize how this rule treats null literals. Possible values:
trans-unit.target: "null" ：定制此规则如何处理 null 文字。可能的值：

trans-unit.source: "number" (true by default) - When this is true, this rule warns shorter type conversions for number type.
trans-unit.target: "number" （ true 默认） -如果这是 true ，这条规则警告较短的类型转换 number 类型。

trans-unit.source: "numbers": true requires quotes around numbers used as object property names (only applies when using as-needed)
trans-unit.target: "numbers": true 要求在用作对象属性名称的数字周围加上引号（仅在 as-needed 使用时适用）

trans-unit.source: "objectsInArrays": false disallows spaces between brackets of array literals and braces of their object literal elements [{ or }]
trans-unit.target: "objectsInArrays": false 不允许在数组文字的括号及其对象文字元素的括号 [{ 或 }] 之间使用空格

trans-unit.source: "objectsInArrays": true requires one or more spaces or newlines between brackets of array literals and braces of their object literal elements [ { or } ]
trans-unit.target: "objectsInArrays": true 要求在数组文字的括号及其对象文字元素的括号 [ { 或 } ] 一个或多个空格或换行符

trans-unit.source: "objectsInObjects": false disallows spacing inside of braces of objects beginning and/or ending with an object element (applies when the first option is set to always)
trans-unit.target: "objectsInObjects": false 不允许在对象大括号内以对象元素开头和/或结尾的空格（当第一个选项设置为 always 时适用）

trans-unit.source: "objectsInObjects": true requires spacing inside of braces of objects beginning and/or ending with an object element (applies when the first option is set to never)
trans-unit.target: "objectsInObjects": true 要求在对象括号内以对象元素开头和/或结尾的空格（当第一个选项设置为 never 时适用）

trans-unit.source: "off" or 0 - turn the rule off
trans-unit.target: "off" 或 0 -关闭规则

trans-unit.source: "omitLastInOneLineBlock": true ignores the last semicolon in a block in which its braces (and therefore the content of the block) are in the same line
trans-unit.target: "omitLastInOneLineBlock": true 忽略其大括号（以及该块的内容）在同一行中的块中的最后一个分号

trans-unit.source: "only-multiline" allows (but does not require) trailing commas when the last element or property is in a different line than the closing ] or } and disallows trailing commas when the last element or property is on the same line as the closing ] or }
trans-unit.target: "only-multiline" 允许（但不要求）后逗号时的最后一个元素或属性是一个不同的线比闭合 ] 或 } 和不允许尾随逗号时的最后一个元素或属性是基于相同的线为闭合 ] 或 }

trans-unit.source: "onlyDeclarations": false requires all variable names to match the specified regular expression
trans-unit.target: "onlyDeclarations": false 要求所有变量名称与指定的正则表达式匹配

trans-unit.source: "onlyDeclarations": true requires only var, function, and class declarations to match the specified regular expression
trans-unit.target: "onlyDeclarations": true 只需要 var ， function 和 class 声明来匹配指定的正则表达式

trans-unit.source: "outerIIFEBody" (default: 1) enforces indentation level for file-level IIFEs.
trans-unit.target: "outerIIFEBody" （默认值：1）对文件级IIFE强制执行缩进级别。

trans-unit.source: "outside" enforces always wrapping the call expression. The default is "outside".
trans-unit.target: "outside" 强制始终包装调用表达式。默认值为 "outside" 。

trans-unit.source: "overrides" allows overriding spacing style for specified keywords
trans-unit.target: "overrides" 允许覆盖指定关键字的间距样式

trans-unit.source: "overrides" overrides the global setting for specified operators
trans-unit.target: "overrides" 覆盖指定运算符的全局设置

trans-unit.source: "prefer" enforces consistent documentation tags specified by an object whose properties mean instead of key use value (for example, "return": "returns" means instead of @return use @returns)
trans-unit.target: "prefer" 强制执行由对象指定的一致文档标记，该对象的属性表示的是属性值而不是键使用值（例如， "return": "returns" 表示不是 @return 使用 @returns ）

trans-unit.source: "prefer-double" (default) enforces the use of double quotes for all JSX attribute values that don't contain a double quote.
trans-unit.target: "prefer-double" （默认）对所有不包含双引号的JSX属性值强制使用双引号。

trans-unit.source: "prefer-single" enforces the use of single quotes for all JSX attribute values that don’t contain a single quote.
trans-unit.target: "prefer-single" 对所有不包含单引号的JSX属性值强制使用单引号。

trans-unit.source: "preferType" enforces consistent type strings specified by an object whose properties mean instead of key use value (for example, "object": "Object" means instead of object use Object)
trans-unit.target: "preferType" 强制执行由对象指定的一致类型的字符串，该对象的属性表示的是属性而不是键使用值（例如， "object": "Object" 表示的是代替 object 使用 Object ）

trans-unit.source: "problem" means the rule is identifying code that either will cause an error or may cause a confusing behavior. Developers should consider this a high priority to resolve.
trans-unit.target: "problem" 表示规则正在识别将导致错误或可能引起混乱行为的代码。开发人员应将此视为解决的高度优先事项。

trans-unit.source: "properties": "always" (default) enforces camelcase style for property names
trans-unit.target: "properties": "always" （默认）对属性名称强制使用驼峰样式

trans-unit.source: "properties": "never" does not check property names
trans-unit.target: "properties": "never" 不检查属性名称

trans-unit.source: "properties": always (default) enforces identifier length convention for property names

trans-unit.source: RuleTester#run calls the describe function with two arguments: a string describing the rule, and a callback function. The callback calls the it function with a string describing the test case, and a test function. The test function will return successfully if the test passes, and throw an error if the test fails. (Note that this is the standard behavior for test suites when using frameworks like Mocha; this information is only relevant if you plan to customize RuleTester.it and RuleTester.describe.)
trans-unit.target: RuleTester#run 使用两个参数调用 describe 函数：一个描述规则的字符串和一个回调函数。回调使用描述测试用例的字符串和测试函数来调用 it 函数。如果测试通过，则测试函数将成功返回；如果测试失败，则抛出错误。（请注意，这是使用Mocha之类的框架时测试套件的标准行为；仅当您计划自定义 RuleTester.it 和 RuleTester.describe 时，此信息才有意义。）

trans-unit.source: filterCodeBlock - (optional) A function that decides which code blocks the linter should adopt. The function receives two arguments. The first argument is the virtual filename of a code block. The second argument is the text of the code block. If the function returned true then the linter adopts the code block. If the function was omitted, the linter adopts only *.js code blocks. If you provided a filterCodeBlock function, it overrides this default behavior, so the linter doesn't adopt *.js code blocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: filterCodeBlock -（可选）确定Linter应该采用哪些代码块的函数。该函数接收两个参数。第一个参数是代码块的虚拟文件名。第二个参数是代码块的文本。如果函数返回 true ,则linter采用代码块。如果省略该函数，则linter仅采用 *.js 代码块。如果提供了 filterCodeBlock 函数，它将覆盖此默认行为，因此linter不会自动采用 *.js 代码块。

trans-unit.source: fix - A boolean or a function (default: false). If a function, it will be passed each linting message and should return a boolean indicating whether the fix should be included with the output report (errors and warnings will not be listed if fixed). Files on disk are never changed regardless of the value of fix. To persist changes to disk, call outputFixes().
trans-unit.target: fix -布尔值或函数（默认值： false ）。如果是函数，它将在每条lint消息中传递给它，并应返回一个布尔值，指示是否应在输出报告中包含此修复程序（如果已修复，则错误和警告将不列出）。不管 fix 的值如何，磁盘上的文件都不会更改。要持久保存对磁盘的更改，请调用 outputFixes() 。

trans-unit.source: groups (string[][]) - specifies operator groups to be checked. The groups option is a list of groups, and a group is a list of binary operators. Default operator groups are defined as arithmetic, bitwise, comparison, logical, and relational operators. Note: Ternary operator(?:) can be part of any group and by default is allowed to be mixed with other operators.
trans-unit.target: groups （ string[][] ）-指定要检查的运算符组。该 groups 选项组的列表，以及一组是二元操作的列表。默认运算符组定义为算术运算符，按位运算符，比较运算符，逻辑运算符和关系运算符。注意：三元运算符（？:)可以属于任何组，默认情况下允许与其他运算符混合使用。

trans-unit.source: lib/api.js - this is the entry point of require("eslint"). This file exposes an object that contains public classes Linter, CLIEngine, RuleTester, and SourceCode.

trans-unit.source: lib/cli-engine/ - this module is CLIEngine class that finds source code files and configuration files then does code verifying with the Linter class. This includes the loading logic of configuration files, parsers, plugins, and formatters.
trans-unit.target: lib/cli-engine/ -此模块是 CLIEngine 类，该模块查找源代码文件和配置文件，然后使用 Linter 类进行代码验证。这包括配置文件，解析器，插件和格式化程序的加载逻辑。

trans-unit.source: lib/cli.js - this is the heart of the ESLint CLI. It takes an array of arguments and then uses eslint to execute the commands. By keeping this as a separate utility, it allows others to effectively call ESLint from within another Node.js program as if it were done on the command line. The main call is cli.execute(). This is also the part that does all the file reading, directory traversing, input, and output.
trans-unit.target: lib/cli.js -这是ESLint CLI的核心。它接受一个参数数组，然后使用 eslint 执行命令。通过将其保留为一个单独的实用程序，它可以使其他人从另一个Node.js程序中有效地调用ESLint，就像在命令行中一样。主要调用是 cli.execute() 。这也是执行所有文件读取，目录遍历，输入和输出的部分。

trans-unit.source: lib/init/ - this module contains --init functionality that set up a configuration file for end users.
trans-unit.target: lib/init/ -此模块包含 --init 功能，可为最终用户设置配置文件。

trans-unit.source: lib/linter/ - this module is the core Linter class that does code verifying based on configuration options. This file does no file I/O and does not interact with the console at all. For other Node.js programs that have JavaScript text to verify, they would be able to use this interface directly.
trans-unit.target: lib/linter/ -此模块是核心 Linter 类，该类基于配置选项进行代码验证。该文件没有文件I / O，并且根本不与 console 交互。对于其他具有JavaScript文本进行验证的Node.js程序，他们将能够直接使用此接口。

trans-unit.source: lib/rule-tester/ - this module is RuleTester class that is a wrapper around Mocha so that rules can be unit tested. This class lets us write consistently formatted tests for each rule that is implemented and be confident that each of the rules work. The RuleTester interface was modeled after Mocha and works with Mocha's global testing methods. RuleTester can also be modified to work with other testing frameworks.
trans-unit.target: lib/rule-tester/ -此模块是 RuleTester 类，是Mocha的包装器，因此可以对规则进行单元测试。通过此类，我们可以为已实施的每个规则编写格式一致的测试，并确信每个规则都能正常工作。RuleTester接口是根据Mocha建模的，并与Mocha的全局测试方法一起使用。RuleTester也可以修改为与其他测试框架一起使用。

trans-unit.source: lib/rules/ - this contains built-in rules that verify source code.
trans-unit.target: lib/rules/ -包含用于验证源代码的内置规则。

trans-unit.source: lib/source-code/ - this module is SourceCode class that is used to represent the parsed source code. It takes in source code and the Program node of the AST representing the code.
trans-unit.target: lib/source-code/ -此模块是 SourceCode 类，用于表示已解析的源代码。它接受源代码，AST的Program节点代表该代码。
