trans-unit.source: natural - if true, enforce properties to be in natural order. Default is false. Natural Order compares strings containing combination of letters and numbers in the way a human being would sort. It basically sorts numerically, instead of sorting alphabetically. So the number 10 comes after the number 3 in Natural Sorting.
trans-unit.target: natural -如果为 true ，则将属性强制为自然顺序。默认值为 false 。“自然顺序”以人类排序的方式比较包含字母和数字组合的字符串。它基本上按数字排序，而不是按字母排序。因此，数字10在自然排序中位于数字3之后。

trans-unit.source: never (default) requires ()
trans-unit.target: never （默认）需要 ()

trans-unit.source: never - Never use === or !== with null.
trans-unit.target: never -永远不要将===或！==与 null 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: never - never report shadowing before the outer variables/functions are defined.
trans-unit.target: never -在定义外部变量/函数之前从不报告阴影。

trans-unit.source: never disallows any space followed by the ( of arguments.
trans-unit.target: never 不允许在参数后跟 ( )的空格。

trans-unit.source: never excepting empty requires ( ) (empty parens without a space is here forbidden)
trans-unit.target: never 排除 empty require ( ) （此处禁止没有空格的空括号）

trans-unit.source: objectLiteralComputedProperties - enable computed object literal property names
trans-unit.target: objectLiteralComputedProperties -启用计算对象文字属性名称

trans-unit.source: objectLiteralDuplicateProperties - enable duplicate object literal properties in strict mode
trans-unit.target: objectLiteralDuplicateProperties -在严格模式下启用重复的对象文字属性

trans-unit.source: objectLiteralShorthandMethods - enable object literal shorthand methods
trans-unit.target: objectLiteralShorthandMethods -启用对象文字速记方法

trans-unit.source: objectLiteralShorthandProperties - enable object literal shorthand properties
trans-unit.target: objectLiteralShorthandProperties -启用对象文字速记属​​性

trans-unit.source: objects is for object literals and object patterns of destructuring. (e.g. let {a,} = {a: 1};)
trans-unit.target: objects 用于对象文字和对象模式的分解。（例如， let {a,} = {a: 1}; ）

trans-unit.source: objectsInArrays sets the spacings between the curly braces and square brackets of object literals that are the first or last element in an array.
trans-unit.target: objectsInArrays 设置对象常量的大括号和方括号之间的间距，这些对象常量是数组中的第一个或最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: objectsInObjects sets the spacing between the curly brace of an object literal that is the last element in an object and the curly brace of the containing object.
trans-unit.target: objectsInObjects 设置作为对象中最后一个元素的对象文字的花括号与包含对象的花括号之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: octalLiterals - enable octal literals
trans-unit.target: octalLiterals -启用八进制文字

trans-unit.source: options (array, optional): The options passed to the rule. The rule severity should not be included in this list.

trans-unit.target: other ：任何其他形式的声明

trans-unit.source: output (string, optional): Asserts the output that will be produced when using this rule for a single pass of autofixing (e.g. with the --fix command line flag). If this is null, asserts that none of the reported problems suggest autofixes.
trans-unit.target: output （字符串，可选）：声明使用此规则进行单次自动修复时将产生的输出（例如，使用 --fix 命令行标志）。如果为 null ，则断言所报告的问题均未建议自动修复。

trans-unit.source: output - Fixed code text (might be the same as input if no fixes were applied).
trans-unit.target: output -固定的代码文本（如果未应用任何修订，则可能与输入相同）。

trans-unit.source: output - The source code for the given file with as many fixes applied as possible, so you can use that to rewrite the files if necessary. This property is omitted if no fix is available.
trans-unit.target: output -给定文件的源代码，并应用了尽可能多的修复程序，因此如有必要，可以使用该代码重写文件。如果没有可用的修复程序，则忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: parameters (default: 1) enforces indentation level for parameters in a function declaration. This can either be a number indicating indentation level, or the string "first" indicating that all parameters of the declaration must be aligned with the first parameter. This can also be set to "off" to disable checking for FunctionDeclaration parameters.
trans-unit.target: parameters （默认值：1）对函数声明中的参数强制执行缩进级别。它可以是表示缩进级别的数字，也可以是表示声明的所有参数必须与第一个参数对齐的字符串 "first" 。也可以将其设置为 "off" 以禁用对FunctionDeclaration参数的检查。

trans-unit.source: parameters (default: 1) enforces indentation level for parameters in a function expression. This can either be a number indicating indentation level, or the string "first" indicating that all parameters of the expression must be aligned with the first parameter. This can also be set to "off" to disable checking for FunctionExpression parameters.
trans-unit.target: parameters （默认值：1）对函数表达式中的参数强制执行缩进级别。它可以是表示缩进级别的数字，也可以是表示表达式的所有参数必须与第一个参数对齐的字符串 "first" 。也可以将其设置为 "off" 以禁用对FunctionExpression参数的检查。

trans-unit.source: parameters (off by default) enforces indentation level for parameters in a function declaration. This can either be a number indicating indentation level, or the string "first" indicating that all parameters of the declaration must be aligned with the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: parameters （默认情况下为禁用）对函数声明中的参数强制执行缩进级别。它可以是表示缩进级别的数字，也可以是表示声明的所有参数必须与第一个参数对齐的字符串 "first" 。

trans-unit.source: parameters (off by default) enforces indentation level for parameters in a function expression. This can either be a number indicating indentation level, or the string "first" indicating that all parameters of the expression must be aligned with the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: parameters （默认情况下处于禁用状态）对函数表达式中的参数强制执行缩进级别。它可以是表示缩进级别的数字，也可以是表示表达式的所有参数必须与第一个参数对齐的字符串 "first" 。

trans-unit.source: parser - Specify the parser to be used (default: espree). Corresponds to --parser.
trans-unit.target: parser -指定要使用的解析器（默认值： espree ）。对应于 --parser 。

trans-unit.source: parserOptions - An object containing parser options (default: empty object). Corresponds to --parser-options.
trans-unit.target: parserOptions -包含解析器选项的对象（默认：空对象）。对应于 --parser-options 。

trans-unit.source: parserOptions - acts the same as parserOptions in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: parserOptions -与配置文件中的 parserOptions 相同。

trans-unit.source: parserOptions - the parser options configured for this run (more details here).
trans-unit.target: parserOptions -为此运行配置的解析器选项（此处有更多详细信息）。

trans-unit.source: parserPath - the full path to the parser from configuration.
trans-unit.target: parserPath -配置中 parser 的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: parserPath - the name of the parser from configuration.
trans-unit.target: parserPath -配置中 parser 的名称。

trans-unit.source: parserServices - an object containing parser-provided services for rules. The default parser does not provide any services. However, if a rule is intended to be used with a custom parser, it could use parserServices to access anything provided by that parser. (For example, a TypeScript parser could provide the ability to get the computed type of a given node.)
trans-unit.target: parserServices -包含解析器为规则提供的服务的对象。默认解析器不提供任何服务。但是，如果打算将规则与自定义解析器一起使用，则可以使用 parserServices 访问该解析器提供的任何内容。（例如，TypeScript解析器可以提供获取给定节点的计算类型的能力。）

trans-unit.source: preprocess - (optional) A function that Processors in Plugins documentation describes as the preprocess method.

trans-unit.target: problem -修复代码中的潜在错误

trans-unit.target: propertyName 在计算的成员表达式的方括号中设置间距。

trans-unit.source: props - if this is true, no-self-assign rule warns self-assignments of properties. Default is true.
trans-unit.target: props -如果为 true ， no-self-assign 规则会警告属性的自我分配。默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.target: prototypejs -Prototype.js全局变量。

trans-unit.target: protractor -量角器全局变量。

trans-unit.source: qunit - QUnit global variables.
trans-unit.target: qunit -QUnit全局变量。

trans-unit.source: range (number[]) is an array of two numbers. Both numbers are a 0-based index which is the position in the array of source code characters. The first is the start position of the node, the second is the end position of the node. code.slice(node.range[0], node.range[1]) must be the text of the node. This range does not include spaces/parentheses which are around the node.
trans-unit.target: range （ number[] ）是两个数字组成的数组。这两个数字都是从0开始的索引，它是源代码字符数组中的位置。第一个是节点的开始位置，第二个是节点的结束位置。 code.slice(node.range[0], node.range[1]) 必须是节点的文本。该范围不包括节点周围的空格/括号。

trans-unit.source: rangeOptions is an object which has 1 property: includeComments.
trans-unit.target: rangeOptions 是一个具有1个属性的对象： includeComments 。

trans-unit.source: raw (string) is the source code of this literal. This is the same as code.slice(node.range[0], node.range[1]).
trans-unit.target: raw （ string ）是此文字的源代码。这与 code.slice(node.range[0], node.range[1]) 。

trans-unit.source: reachable (boolean) - A flag which shows whether or not it's reachable. This becomes false when preceded by return, throw, break, or continue.
trans-unit.target: reachable （ boolean ）-一个标志，显示它是否可达。在 return ， throw ， break 或 continue 运算时，这将成为 false 。

trans-unit.source: recommended (boolean) is whether the "extends": "eslint:recommended" property in a configuration file enables the rule
trans-unit.target: recommended （布尔）是配置文件中的 "extends": "eslint:recommended" 属性是否启用规则

trans-unit.source: regexUFlag - enable the regular expression u flag
trans-unit.target: regexUFlag -启用正则表达式 u 标志

trans-unit.source: regexYFlag - enable the regular expression y flag
trans-unit.target: regexYFlag -启用正则表达式 y 标志

trans-unit.source: remove(nodeOrToken) - removes the given node or token
trans-unit.target: remove(nodeOrToken) -删除给定的节点或令牌

trans-unit.source: removeRange(range) - removes text in the given range
trans-unit.target: removeRange(range) -删除给定范围内的文本

trans-unit.source: replaceText(nodeOrToken, text) - replaces the text in the given node or token
trans-unit.target: replaceText(nodeOrToken, text) -替换给定节点或令牌中的文本

trans-unit.source: replaceTextRange(range, text) - replaces the text in the given range
trans-unit.target: replaceTextRange(range, text) -替换给定范围内的文本

trans-unit.source: replacedBy (array) in the case of a deprecated rule, specifies replacement rule(s)
trans-unit.target: replacedBy （阵列）中已经被废弃的规则的情况下，指定替换规则（S）

trans-unit.source: replacedBy - An array of rules that replace the deprecated rule (e.g. ["indent"]).
trans-unit.target: replacedBy 替换不推荐使用的规则的规则数组（例如 ["indent"] ）。

trans-unit.source: report(descriptor) - reports a problem in the code (see the dedicated section).
trans-unit.target: report(descriptor) -报告代码中的问题（请参阅专用部分）。
